projects.title: Swifty Jam's Space
projects.desc: I'm trying to create a new concept of gesture and 3D Navigation concept at the moment. The idea is to be able to reach a huge quantity of data in a 3D environment using a Golden Ratio longitude method for evenly distributed spheres, and a angled tree distribution for the branches, usign a natural gesture flow to move around and access the data. It can have uses in many big data applications, and I will test it in my new portfolio!

links.name: Try it! (Heroku, let it start up...)

projects.linkdesc: We developed an Experiment design for Swifty Jam.
projects.keywords: Design, Web, UX, UI, Branding, App

projects.title: Quasmic
projects.desc: This time, we explored a new way to represent big quantity of data in a visual and comfortable way for astronomers and sky photographers. Quasmic is a social ennhaced tool that lets you navigate through the known universe and see what other observers have published about an astronomical body in a slick way. We develope from 0% to 100%, even creating our own Graphic Engine with WebGL
projects.linkdesc: We developed a full Web App for University of Alicante.
projects.keywords: Design, Web, UX, UI, Branding, App

projects.title: Monkbag
projects.desc: Created from scratch an App that can be used as a vademecum to consult a huge plant database for phitotherapy use, full of rich content and data. Also it will generate suggestions to treat the conditions you throw at it, creating a complex match to find the optimal combination of plants based also on user's personal data. This project was designed and developed with its own business model, and its already registered in a funding process
projects.linkdesc: We developed a full project for Monkbag.

projects.title: Nonstap
projects.desc: App Design and Prototype made for the cityhall of Torrevieja to improve its tourism flow. The idea was to simplify through the interface a complex AI that would calculate the best places to visit having in count traffic, population, weather, sentiment, reviews... The result was translated to a three-step app that has a Tinder vibe, launching the user to the adventure as soon as it opens it!
projects.linkdesc: Developed a full UX UI design for Nonstap.
projects.keywords: Design, Web, UX, UI, Branding, App

projects.title: OnRails Trains and TFL
projects.desc:
The app displays live departure and arrival times for the next two hours for all stations in the UK. Mark favorites view recently departed services and get live station information from the national rail feed. Useful details like a number of coaches, platform number and reasons for delay or cancellation are shown where available.

Data is provided under license from National Rail. A TFL tube status screen is also available for London commuters.
projects.linkdesc: We developed a full UX UI design for OnRails.
projects.keywords: Design, Web, UX, UI, Branding, App

projects.title: Murcia Turistica
projects.client: Instituto de Turismo Region de Murcia
projects.desc: I had the luck of working with the Tourism Institute of Region de Murcia in this exciting project. Together, we went through all their content and we figured out how to restyle, restructure, rebrand and give a new focus to their UX/UI. The need for providing a cleaner user experience made this website improve their visibility and usability! Congrats team :D
projects.linkdesc: We developed a full UX UI design for Murcia Turistica.
projects.keywords: Design, Web, UX, UI, Branding, App

projects.title: Placed App Website
projects.desc: Collaborated with the full-stack developer Bill Purvis on the creation of UX/UI and also Front-end of the Placed-app website development. We aimed to create a fluid experience of navigation and clear information. Here you can see the main landing page.
projects.linkdesc: We developed a full UX UI and web development for Placed App.
projects.keywords: Design, Web, UX, UI, Front End, Placed App
